title: GG2easy - The insane escape feat Unbenched Kench

embed.description: One of, if not THE closest fights I have EVER done in my league career to date. Gotta give credit to my entire amazing team, they were amazing and of course the Tahm Kench, was amazing to have as support for this game. Enjoy :D All Aboard the spice train!

body: had to make this, was recording the game and this happens. Legit the closest I have ever come to death i think. was just luck, skill, allies, mistakes, everything in one go. I have warlords on in this too which obvs made the difference.

replies.body:
luck and skills are opposite. cant have both, you can have luck and enemies lack of skill though

they rushed and tunneled too hard, missed like 70% of attacks on you

btw bronze know about laning but not objectives, but silvers dont know about laning but they know about objectives

LOL you can have both. Such a thing as tilt, or a misclick lol. Love that you think that it was a bronze level game, dw about me side stepping taliyah's rock or tahm using everyhing over and over to somehow keep me alive just long enough.

But sure, talk more crap.

ok let me clear it up

A) i was saying was skills and some good team mates, not luck. And the enemy team was too focused on you for their own good.

B) wasn't talking about that game in 2nd part. That was about the video after it "what each ELO means"
B) lol bronze don't know how to lane man, they know to STAND in a lane, thats all.
